      • Bag

        public Bag(int num)
        Initializes the bag with n = num dices of each color
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns:
        the number of dices in the bag

      • pickDices

        public java.util.List<Dice> pickDices(int num)
        Takes n = (num*2 + 1) random dices from the bag, adds them in a list and removes them from the bag
        Parameters:
        num - is the number of players of the match
        Returns:
        a list of n = (num*2 + 1) dices taken from the bag

      • pickSingleDice

        public Dice pickSingleDice()
        Picks a single random dice from the bag
        Returns:
        a dice or null if the bag is empty

      • putDiceInBag

        public void putDiceInBag(Dice dice)
        Puts a dice back in the bag
        Parameters:
        dice - is the dice to put in the bag
